channel.title: Agile Tour Aix-Marseille 2017 on The Agile Kaleidoscope
channel.description: Recent content in Agile Tour Aix-Marseille 2017 on The Agile Kaleidoscope

item.title: Mostafa
item.description: Mostafa is a sale manager. What a smile! I’m pretty sure I have a planning poker deck from his company somewhere.

item.title: Mohamed
item.description: Mohamed is a Scrum Master. We’ve met this summer at a Meetup about SAFe. We were pleased to bump into each other again.

item.title: Jean Luc
item.description:
Jean-Luc is a consultant.

In order to come from New Caledonia, he spent more time on the plane than with us.

item.title: Eric
item.description: Eric is a product owner. He came with his co-worker Anthony. I would quote Master Yoda on this one “Always two there are; no more, no less. A master and an apprentice.” Guess who’s who!

item.title: Anthony
item.description: Anthony is a product owner. He was invited by his co-worker Eric. I would quote Master Yoda on this one “Always two there are; no more, no less. A master and an apprentice.” Guess who’s who!

item.title: Sophie
item.description: Sophie is an Agile coach. She’s proud of what she has accomplished with her co-workers.

item.title: Viviane
item.description: Viviane is a facilitator. Her superpower? Graphic facilitation! She believes in the power of collective intelligence

item.title: Jerome
item.description: Jérôme is Scrum Master. He’s on an undercover mission but don’t tell anyone, it’s classified!

item.title: Asmaa & Maria
item.description: Asmaa (left) is a product owner and Maria (right) is a developer. They rather liked to pose together.

item.title: Léo
item.description: Léo is an Agile/Lean coach. He came all the way from Switzerland to talk at Agile Tour Aix-Marseille 2017 in the south of France.

item.title: Yvan
item.description: Yvan is one of the co-organizers of the Agile Tour Aix-Marseille. He’s embarking soon on a new professional journey! Feel free to call him Yves or Yann too.
